data.oai_dc:dc: geometric morphometric landmarks of A_alluaudi LPJs

This file contains x and y co-ordinates of A. alluaudi lower pharyngeal jaws (LPJ) used in geometric morphometrics analyses, and calculations of area and centroid size (Figure 3a-c, Table S3). Co-ordinates are in millimeter scale, as set using the 'scale' function in ImageJ. Specimen names correspond those assigned in Table S1.
